product_name: OMRI S168 High-back Ergonomic office Chair
description:
◆ Delivery to your designated address within 3 to 5 working days.
◆ Model S3 Comes with Additional Molded form cushion Seat Pan, Cushion Padded Armrest and 3D retractable   Lumbar Support.
◆ Model S8 Comes with Additional Cushion Padded Armrest and Adjustable Lumbar Support.
◆ Ergonomic - This High Back office chair is designed according to the structure of the human spine, which can keep your spine properly aligned and provide neck, shoulder, waist and coccyx support to make you feel more relaxed.
◆ Excellent Lumbar Support for your back  
◆ High Quality - The desk chair can be rotated 360 degrees and the height can be adjusted, and the noise-free casters can protect the floor
◆ Comfortable - The back design of this chair supports the natural curvature of the spine and protects your lower and middle backs when you are prompted to sit upright.
◆ Safety - The explosion-proof bottom plate of the office chair is made of heavy materials. It has passed the safety test and has high stability and safety.
◆ Free 1 months warranty on pneumatic gas sleeve
◆ Service - Local support in Singapore
